name: J√°-J√° Pagamentos for WooCommerce – Payment with MULTICAIXA Express
author: jajapagamentos

sections.description:
This plugin will allow you to accept payment with MULTICAIXA Espress.

This plugin works with the [J√°-J√° Pagamentos] gateway, and a contract with an Angolan bank is required.

Features:

  • Accepts payments with MULTICAIXA Express the top payment application in Angola;
  • Automatically changes the order status to ‚ÄúProcessing‚Äù (or ‚ÄúCompleted‚Äù if the order only contains virtual downloadable products) and notifies both the customer and the store owner.
  • GPO test environment support
  • PHP7 tested and compatible
sections.installation:
• Use the included automatic install feature on your WordPress admin panel and search for “J√° J√° Pagamentos MULTICAIXA‚Äù.
  • Go to WooCoomerce > Settings > Payments > MULTICAIXA Express and fill in the details provided by J√°-J√° Pagamentos and your bank in order to use this payment method. A contract with J√°-J√° Pagamentos and a bank is mandatory.
  • Start receiving payments üôÇ
sections.faq:
How can I use the plugin with the J√° J√° Pagamentos test environment?

You should return true to the testmode filter to activate the test mode with a simple checkbox.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Initial release.

1.1

  • Create redirect pages for payment with and without sucess.

1.2

  • Support for purchase with QRCODE

1.3

  • Support for HPOS
